basics.name: Stupid Sun
basics.label: Front-end Engineer
basics.summary: Stupid Sun wants to work in a challenging work environment to achieve personal and professional growth. Aim to use his knowledge and skills of software developing and utilize his passion for web-dev.

work.summary: I develop an independent C# project in the first month. Then I joined the swift team. I fixed some bugs and improved a test program called WPST.
highlights: Developed a software named ETool written in C# which was a language I never touched before. This tool is used to config EnodeBs , which are hardwares in communication base stations and is functioning well.
Fastest intern qualified to join a team.

work.summary: Work as a front-end developer mainly in a project franky which is an operational system. Maintain the custom project's front-end part as well.
highlights: Developed a code generator called generator-ng-zhaimi and common lib named zhaimi-common and used them to optimize the front-end framework of project franky as a pioneer for other projects.
Got hundreds of downloads in npm. https://www.npmjs.com/package/generator-ng-zhaimi

volunteer.summary: Joined lots of activities as a volunteer and organized some as a vice captain
highlights: Awarded 'Qingchun Qianxing China Dream' SJTU Summer Practice Advanced Individual and Outstanding Project 3rd Prize

awards.title: China Students Service Outsourcing Innovation & Entrepreneurship Competition Group Free Proposition(Group B) Second Prize
awards.awarder: Ministry of Education of the PRC, Ministry of Commerce of the PRC, Wuxi Municipal People's Government

languages.fluency: ILR level-2 Limited Working Proficiency, which is fluent enough to handle most life and working situations.
